Turn 1 of your face-down Prize cards face up. If it's a {R} Energy card, this attack does 50 more damage. (That Prize card remains face up for the rest of the game.)
Discard any number of {R} Energy cards from your hand. This attack does 50 damage for each card you discarded in this way.
Attach any number of {W} Energy cards from your hand to your Pokémon in any way you like. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)
Shuffle any amount of {W} Energy from your Pokémon into your deck. This attack does 60 damage for each card you shuffled into your deck in this way.
Search your deck for up to 3 basic Energy cards and attach them to your Pokémon in any way you like. Then, shuffle your deck.

Count your Prize cards and put them into your hand. Then, take that many cards from the top of your deck and put them face down as your Prize cards. If you don't have that many cards in your deck, this attack does nothing. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)
Move an Energy from this Pokémon to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.
Shuffle your hand into your deck. Then, draw a card for each card in your opponent's hand.

commerce.feature.redeemcode.down: Code redemption is unavailable right now. We apologize for the inconvenience.
deckbox.sm10.etb.reshiramcharizard.name: Elite Trainer Reshiram & Charizard Deck Box
deckbox.sm10.league.season1.name: Sun & Moon—Unbroken Bonds Deck Box
decks.sm.pcd.letsplayeevee.name: Let’s Play, Eevee!
decks.sm.pcd.letsplaypikachu.name: Let’s Play, Pikachu!
playmat.endgame.losecondition.player.spe: A special card was used. You lost.
playmat.prompt.fewercardsability: Are you sure you want to do this? Using this Ability will result in having fewer cards in your hand.
product.sm.pcd.letsplayeevee.name: Let’s Play, Eevee!
product.sm.pcd.letsplayeevee.sell-text: Join forces with Eevee and friends to play the Pokémon Trading Card Game! This ready-to-play deck includes everything you need to pick up the basics of the game, from the very first card you draw to the last Prize card you take! Evolve Eevee into Flareon to boost your team’s power, and fill up your Bench with fiery Pokémon like Charizard, Moltres, and more. A variety of useful Trainer cards helps round out your strategy.
product.sm.pcd.letsplaypikachu.name: Let’s Play, Pikachu!
product.sm.pcd.letsplaypikachu.sell-text: Join forces with Pikachu and friends to play the Pokémon Trading Card Game! This ready-to-play deck includes everything you need to pick up the basics of the game, from the very first card you draw to the last Prize card you take! Evolve Pikachu into Alolan Raichu to boost your team’s power, and fill up your Bench with electrifying Pokémon like Raikou, Zebstrika, and more. A variety of useful Trainer cards helps round out your strategy.
sleeve.sm10.etb.reshiramcharizard.name: Elite Trainer Reshiram & Charizard Card Sleeves
specialvisualizations.retaliationasleep: If this Pokémon is damaged by an opponent's attack, the Attacking Pokémon is Asleep.
specialvisualizations.retaliationburned: If this Pokémon is damaged by an opponent's attack, the Attacking Pokémon is Burned.
specialvisualizations.retaliationconfuse: If this Pokémon is damaged by an opponent's attack, the Attacking Pokémon is Confused.
If this Pokémon is damaged by an opponent's attack, the Attacking Pokémon is Confused and Poisoned.
